49.title: SLO burn rate problem (count)
49.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and matchesPhrase(event.name,"SLO Burn rate")
| fieldsAdd id=affected_entity_ids[0]
| filter isNotNull(id)
| fieldsAdd entity=if(affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.service_method"), entityName(id, type:"dt.entity.service_method"))
| fieldsAdd entity=if(affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.service"), entityName(id, type:"dt.entity.service"), else:entity)
| fieldsAdd entity=if(affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.application"), entityName(id, type:"dt.entity.application"), else:entity)
| maketimeseries `SLO Burn rate problem`=count(), by:{ event.name }, nonempty:true

51.content:
---
---
**slo level = high**
--- 
SLO high | SLO user experience performance | SLO user experience success rate |  SLO service success rate |  SLO service method success rate 
--- | --- | --- | ---  | --- 
Type | Application performance | Application  error| Service error | Key Request error 
Target (*) | {{ .target_highslo_userexperiencevitallcp }}% | {{ .target_highslo_userexperiencesuccessrate }}% | {{ .target_highslo_servicesuccessrate }}% | {{ .target_highslo_servicemethodsuccessrate }}%
Warning | {{ .warning_highslo_userexperiencevitallcp }}% | {{ .warning_highslo_userexperiencesuccessrate }}% | {{ .warning_highslo_servicesuccessrate }}% | {{ .warning_highslo_servicemethodsuccessrate }}%
SLI | % interval with LCP < 4 sec | % user action without error | % service request without error | % service key request without error
Burn rate threshold | {{ .burnrate_highslo_userexperiencevitallcp }} | {{ .burnrate_highslo_userexperiencesuccessrate }} | {{ .burnrate_highslo_servicesuccessrate }} | {{ .burnrate_highslo_servicemethodsuccessrate }} 
Alert | {{ .violatingsamples_highslo_userexperiencevitallcp }} intervals / {{ .slingwindow_highslo_userexperiencevitallcp }} | {{ .violatingsamples_highslo_userexperiencesuccessrate }} intervals / {{ .slingwindow_highslo_userexperiencesuccessrate }} | {{ .violatingsamples_highslo_servicesuccessrate }} intervals / {{ .slingwindow_highslo_servicesuccessrate }} | {{ .violatingsamples_highslo_servicemethodsuccessrate }} intervals / {{ .slingwindow_highslo_servicemethodsuccessrate }} 
Dealerting | {{ .dealertingsamples_highslo_userexperiencevitallcp }} minutes| {{ .dealertingsamples_highslo_userexperiencesuccessrate }} minutes| {{ .dealertingsamples_highslo_servicesuccessrate }} minutes | {{ .dealertingsamples_highslo_servicemethodsuccessrate }} minutes


(*) default slo period = -{{ .slo_period_day }}d

53.query:
//service (mandatory for segment) 
fetch dt.entity.service
| filter matchesPhrase(tags,"slo")
| fieldsAdd slo_level=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_level:low"),"low")
| fieldsAdd slo_level=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_level:medium"),"medium",else: slo_level)
| fieldsAdd slo_level=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_level:high"),"high",else: slo_level)
| fieldsAdd slo_alert=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_alert:off"),"off")
| fieldsAdd slo_alert=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_alert:on"),"on",else: slo_alert)
//service method
| append [
  fetch dt.entity.service_method
  | filter matchesPhrase(tags,"slo")
  | fieldsAdd slo_level=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_level:low"),"low")
  | fieldsAdd slo_level=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_level:medium"),"medium",else: slo_level)
  | fieldsAdd slo_level=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_level:high"),"high",else: slo_level)
  | fieldsAdd slo_alert=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_alert:off"),"off")
  | fieldsAdd slo_alert=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_alert:on"),"on",else: slo_alert)
  ]
//web application
| append [
  fetch dt.entity.application
  | filter matchesPhrase(tags,"slo")
  | fieldsAdd slo_level=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_level:low"),"low")
  | fieldsAdd slo_level=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_level:medium"),"medium",else: slo_level)
  | fieldsAdd slo_level=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_level:high"),"high",else: slo_level)
  | fieldsAdd slo_alert=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_alert:off"),"off")
  | fieldsAdd slo_alert=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_alert:on"),"on",else: slo_alert)
  | fieldsAdd slo_alert_perf=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_alert_perf:off"),"off")
  | fieldsAdd slo_alert_perf=if(matchesPhrase(tags,"slo_alert_perf:on"),"on",else: slo_alert_perf)
  ]

//SLO alerte
| join [
  fetch dt.davis.problems
  | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and matchesValue(event.name,"SLO Burn rate*")
  | fieldsAdd id=affected_entity_ids[0]
  | sort timestamp asc
  | summarize {`alert_burn_rate_close`=countIf(event.status=="CLOSED"), `alert_burn_rate_active`=countIf(event.status=="ACTIVE"), event.id=takeLast(event.id), display_id=takeLast(display_id), event.name=takeLast(event.name),  event.kind=takeLast(event.kind) }, by:{id, event.status}
  ], on: { id }, kind:leftOuter, prefix:"alert." 

//table
| fieldsAdd `burn-rate alert`=if(`alert.alert_burn_rate_close` > 0,"🟡", else: "")
| fieldsAdd `burn-rate alert`=if(`alert.alert_burn_rate_active` > 0,"🔴", else: `burn-rate alert`)
| fieldsAdd `active/close`=concat(if(isNotNull(alert.alert_burn_rate_active),alert.alert_burn_rate_active,else: ""),"/",if(isNotNull(alert.alert_burn_rate_close),alert.alert_burn_rate_close,else: ""))
| fieldsAdd `active/close`=if(`active/close`=="/","",else: `active/close`)
| fieldsAdd type=if(entity.type=="APPLICATION","frontend")
| fieldsAdd type=if(entity.type=="SERVICE","service",else: type)
| fieldsAdd type=if(entity.type=="SERVICE_METHOD","key request",else: type)
| fields entity.name, type, slo_level, slo_alert, slo_alert_perf=if(isNotNull(slo_alert_perf),slo_alert_perf,else: ""),`burn-rate alert`, `active/close`, `latest problem`=if(isNotNull(alert.display_id),alert.display_id,else: ""), event.id=alert.event.id, event.kind=alert.event.kind, id, entity.type

| sort  entity.type asc

54.title: SLO burn rate problem (duration)
54.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and matchesPhrase(event.name,"SLO Burn rate")
| fieldsAdd id=affected_entity_ids[0]
| filter isNotNull(id)
| fieldsAdd entity=if(affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.service_method"), entityName(id, type:"dt.entity.service_method"))
| fieldsAdd entity=if(affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.service"), entityName(id, type:"dt.entity.service"), else:entity)
| fieldsAdd entity=if(affected_entity_types == array("dt.entity.application"), entityName(id, type:"dt.entity.application"), else:entity)
//| maketimeseries `SLO Burn rate problem`=count(), by:{ entity, event.name, id, display_id, event.id, event.kind }, nonempty:true

59.title: SLO high - service method success rate

62.title: Problems
62.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| fieldsAdd status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","🔴", else: "🟡")
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(status),status, else: "🟢" )
| fields timestamp, status, event.name
| sort status
| limit 100

63.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| fieldsAdd status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","🔴", else: "🟡")
| fieldsAdd status=if(isNotNull(status),status, else: "🟢" )
| fields timestamp, status, event.name, event.category, event.description, event.status, display_id, event.id
| sort status, timestamp desc
| limit 100

64.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| summarize count()
